document_data.mainbody:
The Quima were a moderately sized tribe of Nars found in  Narfell who always weighed their options before acting. There were 1,900 Quima as of 1357 DR.
This tribe was known to exile members who behaved against the decisions of the tribe, as in the case of Horse.
The Quima were found in the western reaches of Narfell between the Harks Finger and the Giantspire Mountains.
